A great game suited for masochists who enjoy being probed through every hole possible simultaneously by big hairy Turkish men with unnatural abilities the dark arts of Beyblading. These Tasmanian devils are able to destroy all of your internal organs with a single glance at their trigger key, while all at once ordering kebabs from their local cocaine dealer. My best experience in this game has been and always will be seeing the ranks of all my silver enemies who utterly annihilated us in high elo matches, yet I cannot stop playing. The life sucking and soul devouring game has left my balls sack dried of semen and my penis flaccid. All in all CSGO is great and would recommend 420/69

hi
i was very sad today, when i just get home from school. log in to my CS GO account and receive a ban line. I mean this is very funny, i have been playing Cs since 1.6 until now, just because some guy report me does not i am hacked. may be because i got a better Ping ( usually only 5-10, other guy always 70-90 ), or better gear, etc i know this is difficult to prove but please check again.
